        @Post(value="json:json")
public org.restlet.representation.Representation receiveRequest(org.restlet.ext.json.JsonRepresentation entity)
        Receives the JSON data sent by an external application Pseudo Code 1. Receive the data 2. Extract the JSON array 3. Send the JSON array to saveData() for further processing

      • saveData

        public boolean saveData(org.json.JSONArray jsonArr)
        Receives the JSON array, transforms it and send it to the db resource to persist it into InfluxDB Pseudo Code 1. Iterate through the JSONArray to get the JSON obj 2. Iterate through the JSON Obj to get the usage details 3. Build the TSDB POJO 4. Pass this POJO obj to the TSDB resource for persisting it into the DB
        Specified by:
        saveData in interface ExternalDataResource
        Parameters:
        jsonArr - An array containing the usage data as part of JSON Objects
        Returns:
        String
